content.raw:
I agree more in depth topic videos similar to the video tutorials Brian did would be a great help to the teams.

For this particular release video (given the time constraints), I was thinking of a montage of short clips (10-15 seconds) demonstrating each new feature. These clips can have a some title text edited over them explaining what is being shown (ex: "Light buoy model") and perhaps some royalty free music in the background.

Does this work or are you looking for more of a screencast with voice narration?
